feed.title: Track Game Datasets Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: :video_game: A curated list of awesome game datasets, and tools to artificial intelligence in games

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on Feb 25, 2025
entry.content:
Miscellaneous / Related

  • Awesome Esports (⭐87) - Competitiosn using video games.

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on Nov 10, 2024
entry.content:
Dataset / Web

  • Animal Crossing New Horizons Catalog - Comprehensive inventory of items, villagers, clothing, fish/bugs etc.
  • Board Games Dataset - Attributes and the ratings from board games in BoardGameGeek.
  • The Complete Pokemon Dataset - Pokemon data from all generations.

Dataset / Related

  • Computer Games Dataset - Gaming World: A Comprehensive Computer Games Dataset.
  • Nintendo Games - Nintendo games for all platforms scraped from metacritc.
  • PC Games Sales - Dataset of the best selling PC games.
  • Steam Video Games - Steam user interactions.
  • Video Game Sales - Sales data from games.

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on Dec 04, 2023
entry.content:
Dataset / Web

  • 320K Roblox App Google Store Reviews - Google Store reviews of Roblox.
  • Age of Empires 2: Definitive Edition 225.000 Games - Data about match ups, outcomes and game states over the time in 225.000 AoE2 matches.
  • Board Games Dataset - Board Games Dataset from BoardGameGeek.

Dataset / Related

  • Steam Games Dataset - Dataset scraped from Steam search system.
  • Video Games Data - Video games synopse.

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on Aug 12, 2023
entry.content:
API

  • Steam Database - Series of tools to Steam data. Website.
  • Steambase - Steam data tools and insights. Website.

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on Apr 30, 2023
entry.content:

  • Millington, Ian, Funge, John (2020). AI for Games, Third Edition. CRC Press.

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on Mar 12, 2023
entry.content:

  • CS:GO Steam Reviews - Steam Reviews.
  • Elden Ring Steam Reviews - Steam Reviews.
  • Hogwarts Legacy Reviews - A list of Hogwarts Legacy reviews.
  • Most Played Games of All Time - Steam game stats.

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on Aug 18, 2022
entry.content:
API

  • Xbox LIVE API - Games, apps, users stats and messages. Website, paper.

Dataset / Web

  • Chess Game Dataset (Lichess) - Chess games, including moves, victor, rating, opening details and more.
  • Fortnite: Battle Royale - Weapon Attributes - Stats of the weapons.
  • GamingVideoSET - A Dataset for Gaming Video Streaming Applications. Paper
  • NBA Players - Biometric, biographic and basic box score features from 1996 to 2019 season.
  • Overwatch - Heros characteristics.
  • Pokémon for Data Mining and Machine Learning - Stats of 721 Pokémon of the first six generations.
  • Pokemon- Weedle's Cave - Battle data of Pokemon.
  • Self Driving Car - Behavioural Cloning Complete Guide.
  • Starcraft: Scouting The Enemy - Player reconnaissance in professional-level.

Dataset / Related

  • Daily Game Companies Historical Stock Price - Game Companies Historical Stock Price 08.2022.
  • Steam Store Games - Information about 27,000 games scraped from Steam and SteamSpy APIs.

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on Aug 28, 2021
entry.content:
API

  • Counter-Strike (⭐0) - data parsing for Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CSGO).

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on Jun 12, 2021
entry.content:
Artificial Intelligence

  • Halite by Two Sigma - Collect the halite during a match in space.

Miscellaneous / Related

  • Gym OpenAI - Game toolkit for reinforcement learning algorithms.

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on Apr 17, 2021
entry.content:
Artificial Intelligence

  • CyberBattleSim (⭐1.7k) - Experimentation platform to investigate automated agents. Website.

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on Sep 18, 2020

  • CartolaFC - Popular brazilian fantasy football (from 2014 to 2017).

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on Sep 07, 2020
entry.content:
Artificial Intelligence / Mobile

  • Habitica (⭐1.6k) - Gamify your life.

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on Apr 21, 2020
entry.content:
Books / Web

  • Drachen, A. Mirza-Babaei, P. Nacke, L. (2018). Games user research. Oxford.
  • El-Nasr, S. Drachen, A. Canossa, A. (2013). Game analytics: maximizing the value of player data. Sprigner.
  • Han, J., Pei, J., Kamber, M. (2011). Data mining: concepts and techniques. Elsevier.
  • Hennig-Thurau, T. Houston, M. (2018). Entertainment science: data analytics and practical theory for movies, games, music and books. Springer.
  • Loh, A. Sheng, Y. Ifenthaler, D. (2015). Serious games analytics: methodologies for performance measurement, assessment, and improvement. Springer.
  • Russell, S. J., Norvig, P. (2016). Artificial intelligence: a modern approach. Malaysia; Pearson Education Limited.
  • Yannakakis, G. N., Togelius, J. (2018). Artificial intelligence and games. Springer.

Dataset / Web

  • 380,000 Guesses Dataset - Higher or Lower? - Real-world game data of guessing a number.
  • League of Legends Diamond Ranked Games (10 min) - Classify ranked games.

Market Research / Related

  • Euro-Monitor, Video Games - Strategic Market Researcher.
  • Grand View Research, Digital Media - Syndicated market research studies.

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on Feb 13, 2020
entry.content:
Market Research / Related

  • Newzoo - View on the games market. Unparalleled insights and value.
  • Statista, Video Games - Market and opinion research institutes and data derived from the economic sector.

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on May 12, 2019
entry.content:
API

  • IGDB - General information of games from any platform.
  • Riot Games - Active games, match history, and ranked statistics.
  • TGDB (⭐136) - General information of games from any platform. Website.

Artificial Intelligence

  • AI Birds - Artificial intelligence competition.
  • Angry Bots - Shooting game against robots.
  • Daimonin - Isometric MMORPG.
  • Deliantra - Adventure game in a medieval environment.
  • Dungeon Crawl: Stone Soup (⭐2.6k) - Roguelike adventure.
  • Fighting Game AI Competition - Controller for a fighting game.
  • FlightGear Flight Simulator - Flight simulator.
  • General Video Game AI - Controller for general video game playing. Paper.
  • Hanabi Competition - Board game competition.
  • Hearthstone AI - Card game competition.
  • Infinite Mario Bros - Super Mario competition. Platformer AI antecedent. Website.
  • Malmo (⭐4.2k) - Platform built on top of Minecraft game.
  • microRTS (⭐313) - RTS game competition. PT-BR (⭐4).
  • Ms. Pac-Man - Pac-Man game competition. Website.
  • OpenLieroX - Liero (similar to Worms) game.
  • Platformer AI - Super Mario competition.
  • qengine (⭐866) - Retro game engine.
  • Retro Contest (⭐3.5k) - Competition on SEGA Genesis games. Website.
  • Showdown AI Competition (⭐14) - Competition of Pokemon battle. Website, paper.
  • StarCraft AI Competition - StarCraft game competition.
  • Text-Based Adventure AI Competition (⭐29) - Text-adventure game competition. Website.
  • The Genius - Chess engine.
  • Visual Doom AI Competition (⭐1.9k) - Doom game competition. Website.

Artificial Intelligence / Mobile

  • Pixel Dungeon (⭐3.7k) - Roguelike game.
  • Shattered Pixel Dungeon (⭐5.4k) - Improved Pixel Dungeon.

Artificial Intelligence / Web

  • Infinite Mario Bros (⭐503) - Super Mario Bros. Play.
  • Onslaught! Arena (⭐201) - Fight off hordes of medieval monsters. Play.
  • TapAI (⭐1) - User interactions with a tap on screen game. Play.

Dataset / Web

  • (LoL) League of Legends Ranked Games - Matches details from ranked games.
  • 2018 FIFA World Cup Squads - Squad details for teams participating in the World Cup.
  • Board Game Data - Data from board games.
  • Boardgaming Online Game Records - Playthroughs of board games.
  • Clash of Clans app store user comments - User reviews from Google Play and iTunes App Store.
  • Complete FIFA 2017 Player dataset (Global) - Players data.
  • Condensing Steam: Distilling the Diversity of Gamer Behavior - Temporal games data.
  • Connect-4 Data Set - Connect-4 game matches.
  • CS:GO Competitive Matchmaking Data - Damage entries on rounds played.
  • Defense of the Ancients - Monsters data from Warcraft III game.
  • Dota 2 Games (UCI) - Matches results.
  • Fortnite Statistics_80 Games - End games statistics.
  • History of Hearthstone - Collection of decks.
  • League of Legends Summoner Ids and Data - 2016 - Game data.
  • OpenDota - Continuous database of Dota 2 matches.
  • Path of exile game statistic - Players data.
  • Platform Experience Dataset - Super Mario Bros matches. Paper.
  • Pokémon GO Pokédex (⭐130) - Encyclopedia Pokemon.
  • Pokemon Wonder Trade Results - Results of wonder trades in Pokemon Moon version.
  • PokemonGO - Pokemon and battle stats.
  • Scrabble (⭐1) - Data Quackle game matches.
  • StarCraft 2 (UCI) - Data stream of matches. Paper.
  • StarCraft II Replay Analysis - Aggregation of the replays.
  • World of Warcraft Avatar History - Collection of records. Website.

Dataset / Related

  • Google Play Store Apps - Data from Play Store apps.
  • JVC Game Reviews - Video game data from JeuxVideo.com.
  • Kickstarter Datasets - Projects details.
  • Metacritic games - Games data from metacritc.
  • Over 13,000 Steam Games - Prices of video games from Steam.
  • PEW-Gaming-Broadband - Questions about video games.
  • Vandal Game Reviews - Game data from Vandal.com.
  • Video Game DATA - Video games released.
  • Video Games Sales 2019 - Sales and scores for games.
  • World Top 100 Countries by Game Revenues - Global game revenue.

Miscellaneous / Related

  • Academic Torrents - Sharing enormous datasets.
  • Awesome ACG (⭐1.4k) - Technologies related to anime, comic and games.
  • Games of Coding (⭐2k) - Games to teach programming language.
  • Games on GitHub (⭐24k) - Popular videos games hosted in GitHub.
  • Libre Game Wiki - Free gaming encyclopedia.
  • Open-source games - Open-source games (PT-BR).
  • UCI - Datasets.
  • Yahoo! Datasets - Datasets.

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on Mar 28, 2019
entry.content:
API

  • Battlefield 4 Stats - Stats, rankings, and progression of a player.
  • Giant Bomb - Game data and players review.
  • PandaScore - Realtime eSports data.
  • smm-course-search (⭐4) - Search courses from Super Mario Maker game.
  • smm-maker-profile (⭐1) - Fetch the user profile from Super Mario Maker game.
  • Steam Web API - Query tool from Steam.
  • vgchartzScrape (⭐86) - Crawler from VGChartz.

Artificial Intelligence

  • Vindinium (⭐0) - Multi-player turn based on roguelike competition. Documentation.

Artificial Intelligence / Web

  • Digger (⭐94) - Boulderdash game. Play.

Dataset / Web

  • Data Game ClashRoyale - Player data of Clash Royale game.

Miscellaneous / Related

  • AWS Datasets - Amazon public datasets.

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on Mar 26, 2019
entry.content:
API

  • Steam Spy - Game statistical from Steam users profiles.

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on Mar 18, 2019
entry.content:
API

  • BoardGameGeek - Board games data.
  • metacritc - Game reviews and evaluation.
  • PokéAPI - Pokémon data of all generations.
  • smm-course-viewer (⭐17) - Read courses from Super Mario Maker saves.

Artificial Intelligence / Web

  • Duck Hunt (⭐608) - Shooting game in ducks. Play.
  • Starship - Traditional starship game. Play.
  • WebNES - Play rooms of NES in web browser. Play.

Dataset / Web

  • Clash royale Dataset - Cards data.
  • FIFA 18 Complete Player Dataset - Players and their attributes.
  • GOSU.AI Dota 2 Game Chats - Chats from matches replays.
  • Hearthstone Cards - Collection of cards.
  • LCS 2017 Summer Split Fantasy Player & Team Stats - Player and team data.
  • Magic The Gathering Cards - Cards data.
  • Oldschool Runescape Polling Data - Historical polling data.
  • Overwatch Game Records - Stats of one player from thousands of matches.
  • Overwatch Ranked Data - Player and match data.
  • Pokemon with stats - Pokemon data with stats and types.
  • Predict'em All - Pokemon appear in PokemonGo over time.
  • PUBG Match Deaths and Statistics - Matches data.
  • SkillCraft-StarCraft - StarCraft 2 league-level performance.
  • StarCraft II matches history - Results of matches.
  • Super Trunfo - Dinossaurs 2 - Cards of this game.
  • Terra Mystica Snellman Statistics - Game logs and statistics.
  • Travian buildings - Time, cost and bonus of buildings.
  • World of Warcraft Battlegrounds - Details of battlegrounds.

Dataset / Related

  • Video Game Sales with Ratings - Video game sales and rating from metacritc.

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on Mar 17, 2019
entry.content:
Miscellaneous / Related

entry.title: Game Datasets Updates on Mar 13, 2019
entry.content:
API

  • OpenDota - Platform providing Dota 2 data.

Artificial Intelligence

  • irrlamb - Puzzle game with physics effects in 3D.
